comments:
3.0 M3
1. empty workspace
2. import w/ source folders org.eclipse.cvs.core
3. modify one file
4. rename src-cvs to src
5. share with dev.eclipse.org
6. expect to reconcile changes but all files marked as outgoing additions. 
further more, if you finish the share wizard without committing then 
synchronize the projects, the files show up as conflicting addititions. Clean 
timestamps won't work and update fails because of files that can't be written.

We need a test case for this scenario.

from the log:

Created an attachment (id=16100)
Happened to me too.

I have never been able to reproduce this. However, I have fixed the problems 
that caused the stack traces in this bug report. One of them appears to be a 
bug in UI (see bug 79916) for which I have provided a patch. I have also added 
a safeguard to the sync model provider to catch and log the SWTException.

Marking as fixed. If you ae able to reproduce, please reopne with the 
stacktrace.
